ai-the-new-oracle.json.title: The New Oracle: How AI Is Replacing Thought
ai-the-new-oracle.json.author: LMC Kingmaker, Kaguya Tempest
ai-the-new-oracle.json.excerpt: Artificial intelligence is poised to supplant religion as the modern architecture of control, argue LMC Kingmaker and Kaguya Tempest.

artificial-intelligence-and-copyright.js.title: The Evolving Landscape of AI and Copyright
artificial-intelligence-and-copyright.js.author: Kudakwashe Kwitireni
artificial-intelligence-and-copyright.js.excerpt: A legal analysis of the tension between authorship, cultural heritage, and intellectual property in the age of generative AI.
